DOC.brief_summary: In stage 3 Osteonecrosis ( ON ) femoral head , beneficial effect bone marrow graft report reduction functional evolution necessity total prosthesis placement non-controlled retrospective trial . Based experience , investigator would like start randomize controlled double blind study effect autologous implantation autologous bone marrow cell necrotic lesion stage 3 ON femoral head .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Study Stage 3 Osteonecrosis Treatment Bone Marrow
DOC.criteria: 1. patient non traumatic ON femoral head 2 . Stage 3 ON ( subchondral fracture ) . 3 . Age > 18 year 4 . Be able willing participate study 1. evidence malignant disorder past five year 2 . Patient unable undergo MRI . 3 . Patient positive HIV , hepatitis B C infection .
